The GM determines the DC based on the nature of the place where you're trying to Subsist. You might need a minimum proficiency rank to Subsist in particularly strange environments. Unlike most downtime activities, you can Subsist after 8 hours or less of exploration, but if you do, you take a -5 penalty.

Krytyczny Sukces You either provide a subsistence living for yourself and one additional creature, or you improve your own food and shelter, granting yourself a comfortable living.

Sukces You find enough food and shelter with basic protection from the elements to provide you a subsistence living.

Porażka You're exposed to the elements and don't get enough food, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} until you attain sufficient food and shelter.

Krytyczna Porażka You attract trouble, eat something you shouldn't, or otherwise worsen your situation. You take a -2 circumstance penalty to checks to Subsist for 1 week. You don't find any food at all; if you don't have any stored up, you're in danger of starving or dying of thirst if you continue failing.

Sample Subsist Tasks

  • Niewyszkolenie lush forest with calm weather or large city with plentiful resources
  • Wytrenowanie typical hillside or village
  • Eksperctwo typical mountains or insular hamlet
  • Mistrzostwo typical desert or city under siege
  • Legendarność barren wasteland or city of undead

Swim.name: Swim
Swim.description:
You propel yourself through water. In most calm water, you succeed at the action without needing to attempt a check. If you must breathe air and you're submerged in water, you must hold your breath each round. If you fail to hold your breath, you begin to drown. If the water you are swimming in is turbulent or otherwise dangerous, you might have to attempt an Athletics check to Swim.

If you end your turn in water and haven't succeeded at a Swim action that turn, you sink 10 feet or get moved by the current, as determined by the GM. However, if your last action on your turn was to enter the water, you don't sink or move with the current that turn.

Krytyczny Sukces You move through the water 10 feet, plus 5 feet per 20 feet of your land Speed (a total of 15 feet for most PCs).

Sukces You move through the water 5 feet, plus 5 feet per 20 feet of your land Speed (a total of 10 feet for most PCs).

Krytyczna Porażka You make no progress, and if you're holding your breath, you lose 1 round of air.

Sample Swim Tasks

  • Niewyszkolenie lake or other still water
  • Wytrenowanie flowing water, like a river
  • Eksperctwo swiftly flowing river
  • Mistrzostwo stormy sea
  • Legendarność maelstrom, waterfall

Tail Toxin.name: Tail Toxin
Tail Toxin.description:
Częstotliwość raz na dzień

Wymagania You are wielding a piercing or slashing weapon

You apply your tail's venom to a piercing or slashing weapon. If your next Strike with that weapon before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, you deal persistent poison damage equal to your level to the target.

Take Control.name: Take Control
Take Control.description:
Wymagania You are aboard the vehicle and adjacent to its controls.

You grab the reins, the wheel, or some other mechanism to control the vehicle. Attempt a piloting check; on a success, you become the vehicle's pilot, or regain control of the vehicle if it was uncontrolled. Some vehicles have complicated controls that cause this action to become a multi-action activity.

Take Cover.name: Take Cover
Take Cover.description:
Wymagania You are benefiting from cover, are near a feature that allows you to take cover, or are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

You press yourself against a wall or duck behind an obstacle to take better advantage of cover. If you would have standard cover, you instead gain greater cover, which provides a +4 circumstance bonus to AC; to Reflex saves against area effects; and to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}, or otherwise avoid detection. Otherwise, you gain the benefits of standard cover (a +2 circumstance bonus instead). This lasts until you move from your current space, use an attack action, become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, or end this effect as a free action.

Take a Breather.name: Take a Breather
Take a Breather.description:
Koszt 1 Resolve Point

You rest for 10 minutes and recover your stamina. After you complete this activity, you regain all your Stamina Points.

Take a Taste.name: Take a Taste
Take a Taste.description:
Wymagania The zombie has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

The zombie tries to grasp and bite a creature. The zombie makes a jaws Strike against the creature. This Strike uses the same statistics as its normal melee Strike, except its damage die is 1d10 and it deals piercing damage.

Tap Ley Line.name: Tap Ley Line
Tap Ley Line.description:
You attempt to manipulate the magical essence of a ley line that you're aware of within 30 feet. The GM determines the DC based on the hard DC for the ley line's level.

Krytyczny Sukces You gain the ley line's benefits until the end of your next turn.

Sukces You gain the ley line's benefits until the end of your turn.

Porażka You take mental damage equal to 1d6 × the ley line's level. You can't Tap the Ley Line again for 1 hour.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and you're subject to the ley line's backlash effect. You can't Tap the Ley Line again for 24 hours.

Telekinetic Assault.name: Telekinetic Assault
Telekinetic Assault.description: Your ghost unleashes a flurry of emotions, causing small objects and debris to fly about in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], dealing @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] for every 2 levels the ghost has (basic Reflex save). This uses a trained DC using the ghost's Charisma modifier or an expert DC if the ghost is specialized.

Ten Paces.name: Ten Paces
Ten Paces.description:
Aktywator You roll initiative.

You react to trouble with lightning speed, positioning yourself just right. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll, and you can Interact to draw a one-handed firearm or one-handed crossbow. As your first action on your first turn, you can Step up to 10 feet as a free action.

Tenacious Stance.name: Tenacious Stance
Tenacious Stance.description:
Wymagania You are wearing armor

Efekt You steady yourself, as tough and immutable as stone. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) and a +2 circumstance bonus to DCs against being Shoved and Tripped. However, you no longer negate your armor check penalty or Speed penalty for having a high Strength while in this stance. After you leave Tenacious Stance, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from the stance, and you become temporarily immune to gaining temporary Hit Points from Tenacious Stance for 1 minute.

Tendril Strike.name: Tendril Strike
Tendril Strike.description:
Stretching to extend its body to its limits, your eidolon attacks a foe that would normally be beyond its reach. Your eidolon makes a melee unarmed Strike, increasing its reach by 5 feet for that Strike.

If the unarmed attack has the disarm, shove, or trip trait, the eidolon can use the corresponding action instead of a Strike.

That's My Number.name: That's My Number
That's My Number.description:
Aktywator You roll your lucky number as your d20 result on a non-secret attack roll, saving throw, or skill check

Efekt You call upon the fortune stored within your lucky number and reroll the triggering check. However, pushing your luck has a price: if your result on the reroll is the same number again, you critically fail, regardless of what degree of success you ordinarily would have received.

Thermal Eruption.name: Thermal Eruption
Thermal Eruption.description:
Częstotliwość raz na dzień

Efekt You concentrate your thermal energy and explode it outward. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] take @Damage[14d6[fire]] damage with a basic Reflex save. Afterward, you lose all effects of the Dormant Eruption feat until your next daily preparations.

Thoughtful Reload.name: Thoughtful Reload
Thoughtful Reload.description: As you sink deep into a state of analytical calm and focus on the foe before you, your hands reload a bullet instinctively. Attempt a Recall Knowledge check against an opponent you can see and then Interact to reload.

Threatening Approach.name: Threatening Approach
Threatening Approach.description: You Stride to be adjacent to a foe and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} that foe. If you succeed, the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} instead of frightened 1.

Thundering Roar.name: Thundering Roar
Thundering Roar.description:
The target unleashes a powerful vocalization. Each enemy in a 10- foot emanation takes 4d8 sonic damage with a basic Will save against your spell DC. A creature that fails its Will save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage from the roar increases by 2d8.

Touch and Go.name: Touch and Go
Touch and Go.description:
Wymagania You're wielding a combination weapon.

Your body's shadows mask your hands' steel. You can Step toward an enemy, you can Interact to change your weapon between melee or ranged modes, and you then Interact to reload.

Toxic Skin.name: Toxic Skin
Toxic Skin.description:
Częstotliwość once per hour

Aktywator A creature touches you, such as by Grappling you, successfully hitting you with an unarmed attack, or using a touch-range spell against you.

You exude a deadly toxin. The triggering creature takes 1d4 poison damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true|traits:poison] using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4.

[[/r ceil(@actor.level/2)d4[poison]]]{Leveled Poison Damage}

Toxic Touch.name: Toxic Touch
Toxic Touch.description:
Częstotliwość raz na dzień

Wymagania Your most recent action was to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through}, and you successfully moved through an enemy's space

Efekt Make a melee unarmed Strike against the enemy whose space you moved through. On a hit, the target takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,poison]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (or takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,poison]] and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical hit).

Track.name: Track
Track.description:
You follow tracks, moving at up to half your travel speed. After a successful check to Track, you can continue following the tracks at half your Speed without attempting additional checks for up to 1 hour. In some cases, you might Track in an encounter. In this case, Track is a single action and doesn't have the exploration trait, but you might need to roll more often because you're in a tense situation. The GM determines how often you must attempt this check.

You attempt your Survival check when you start Tracking, once every hour you continue tracking, and any time something significant changes in the trail. The GM determines the DCs for such checks, depending on the freshness of the trail, the weather, and the type of ground.

Sukces You find the trail or continue to follow the one you're already following.

Porażka You lose the trail but can try again after a 1-hour delay.

Krytyczna Porażka You lose the trail and can't try again for 24 hours.

Sample Track Tasks

  • Niewyszkolenie the path of a large army following a road
  • Wytrenowanie relatively fresh tracks of a rampaging bear through the plains
  • Eksperctwo a nimble panther's tracks through a jungle, tracks obscured by rainfall
  • Mistrzostwo tracks obscured by winter snow, tracks of a mouse or smaller creature, tracks left on surfaces that can't hold prints like bare rock
  • Legendarność old tracks through a windy desert's sands, tracks obscured by a major blizzard or hurricane

Travel.name: Travel
Travel.description:
You progress toward moving into an adjacent hex. In open terrain, like a plain, using 1 Travel activity allows you to move from one hex to an adjacent hex. Traversing a hex with difficult terrain (such as a typical forest or desert) requires 2 Travel activities, and hexes of greater difficult terrain (such as a steep mountain or typical swamp) require 3 Travel activities to traverse. Traveling along a road uses a terrain type one step better than the surrounding terrain. For example, if you are traveling on a road over a mountain pass, the terrain is difficult terrain instead of greater difficult terrain.

The Travel activity assumes you are walking overland. If you are flying or traveling on water, most hexes are open terrain, though there are exceptions. Flying into storms or high winds count as difficult or greater difficult terrain. Traveling down a river is open terrain, but traveling upriver is difficult or greater difficult terrain.

Treat Disease.name: Leczenie Choroby
Treat Disease.description:
Wymagania Nosisz lub trzymasz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{Zestaw Uzdrowiciela}

Spędzasz co najmniej 8 godzin opiekując się schorowaną istotą. Wykonaj test Medycyny przeciw ST choroby. Po tym jak spróbujesz Leczyć Chorobę, nie możesz próbować ponownie aż do momentu kiedy ta istota podejmie się swojego następnego rzutu obronnego przeciw niej.

Krytyczny Sukces Zapewniasz istocie premię sytuacyjną +4 do jej następnego rzutu obronnego przeciw chorobie.

Sukces Zapewniasz istocie premię sytuacyjną +2 do jej następnego rzutu obronnego przeciw chorobie.

Krytyczna Porażka Twoje działania sprawiają, że istota odnosi karę sytuacyjną -2 do jej następnego rzutu obronnego przeciw chorobie.

Treat Poison.name: Leczenie Zatrucia
Treat Poison.description:
Wymagania Nosisz lub trzymasz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{Zestaw Uzdrowiciela}

Zajmujesz się pacjentem, próbując zapobiec rozprzestrzenianiu się trucizny. Wykonaj test Medycyny przeciw ST trucizny. Po tym jak spróbujesz Leczyć Zatrucie, nie możesz próbować ponownie aż do momentu kiedy ta istota podejmie się swojego następnego rzutu obronnego przeciw truciźnie.

Krytyczny Sukces Zapewniasz istocie premię sytuacyjną +4 do jej następnego rzutu obronnego przeciw truciźnie.

Sukces Zapewniasz istocie premię sytuacyjną +2 do jej następnego rzutu obronnego przeciw truciźnie.

Krytyczna Porażka Twoje działania sprawiają, że istota odnosi karę sytuacyjną -2 do jej następnego rzutu obronnego przeciw truciźnie.

Treat Wounds.name: Opatrywanie Ran
Treat Wounds.description:
Wymagania Nosisz lub trzymasz @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.s1vB3HdXjMigYAnY]{Zestaw Uzdrowiciela}

Spędzasz 10 minut opatrując jedną ranną żywą istotę (obierając za cel siebie samego, jeśli chcesz). Cel jest następnie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Lb4q2bBAgxamtix5]{niewrażliwy} na akcję Opatrywania Ran, ale ten interwał nakłada się z czasem, który poświęcasz na samo leczenie (a więc pacjent może być opatrywany raz na godzinę, nie raz na 70 minut).

ST testu medycyny wynosi zwykle 15 ale MG może je zmodyfikować ze względu na okoliczności, takie jak opatrywanie pacjenta na zewnątrz podczas burzy lub opatrywanie ran przeklętych magią. Jeśli jesteś ekspertem w Medycynie możesz zamiast tego podjąć się testu o ST 20 by zwiększyć liczbę odzyskiwanych Punktów Żywotności o 10; jeśli jesteś mistrzem w Medycynie możesz podjąć się testu o ST 30 by zwiększyć liczbę odzyskiwanych Punktów Żywotności o 30; a jeśli jesteś legendą możesz podjąć się testu o ST 40 aby zwiększyć liczbę odzyskiwanych Punktów Żywotności o 50. Obrażenia zadawane przy krytycznej porażce pozostają bez zmian.

Jeśli zdasz test możesz kontynuować opatrywanie celu aby zapewnić mu dodatkowe Punkty Żywotności. Jeśli opatrujesz jego rany przez co najmniej 1 godzinę, podwój ilość Punktów Wytrzymałości, które odzyskuje w wyniku Opatrywania Ran.

Wynik twojego testu medycyny określa ile Punktów Żywotności odzyskuje cel.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pf2e-macros.Macro.6duZj0Ygiqv712rq]{Opatrywanie Ran}

Krytyczny Sukces Cel odzyskuje [[/r 4d8]]{4k8} Punktów Żywotności oraz traci wszystkie @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Rany}.

Sukces Cel odzyskuje [[/r 2d8]]{2k8} Punktów Żywotności oraz traci wszystkie rany.

Krytyczna Porażka Cel otrzymuje [[/r 1d8]]{1k8} obrażeń.

Trip.name: Trip
Trip.description:
Wymagania You have at least one hand free. Your target can't be more than one size larger than you

You try to knock a creature to the ground. Attempt an Athletics check against the target's Reflex DC.

Krytyczny Sukces The target falls and lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and takes @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage.

Sukces The target falls and lands prone.

Krytyczna Porażka You lose your balance and fall and land prone.

Tumble Through.name: Tumble Through
Tumble Through.description:
You Stride up to your Speed. During this movement, you can try to move through the space of one enemy. Attempt an Acrobatics check against the enemy's Reflex DC as soon as you try to enter its space. You can Tumble Through using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, or another action instead of Stride in the appropriate environment.

Sukces You move through the enemy's space, treating the squares in its space as difficult terrain (every 5 feet costs 10 feet of movement). If you don't have enough Speed to move all the way through its space, you get the same effect as a failure.

Porażka Your movement ends, and you trigger reactions as if you had moved out of the square you started in.

Unleash Psyche.name: Unleash Psyche
Unleash Psyche.description:
Aktywator Your turn begins.

Wymagania You're in an encounter, you Cast a Spell on your previous turn, and you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}.

You call on the depths of your mind and let psychic power flood through. Your Psyche remains Unleashed for 2 rounds or until your fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily quell your unleashed psyche. While your Psyche is Unleashed, the following effects occur.

  • You're constantly surrounded by the visual manifestation of your psychic magic.
  • When you cast a damaging spell, you gain a status bonus to its damage equal to double the spell's level. This applies only to spells that don't have a duration and that you cast using psychic spellcasting.
  • You can use actions that have the psyche trait. After your unleashed psyche subsides, your mind must recover from the strain of channeling its full power. You can't use Unleash Psyche again for 2 rounds, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 2 rounds.

Upstage.name: Upstage
Upstage.description:
Aktywator A foe attempts a skill check and doesn't get a critical success

After your foe has tried their best, you show everyone how it's really done. Attempt a check using the same skill that triggered this reaction.

Krytyczny Sukces You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of your next turn.

Sukces As critical success, except you gain the benefits only if the triggering creature failed their skill check.

Venom Draw.name: Venom Draw
Venom Draw.description:
Wymagania Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.s4V7JWSMF9JPJAeX]{Envenom} action hasn't been expended.

You quickly envenom poisonous saliva on your weapon as you draw it. Interact to draw a weapon, and then Envenom it. This uses up your daily use of Envenom.

Visions of Sin.name: Visions of Sin
Visions of Sin.description:
Częstotliwość raz na 10 minut

Your eidolon summons images of its sin into the mind of a target creature within 30 feet, tormenting and confusing the target. The target must attempt a Will save against your spell DC with the following effects. The effects last until the end of your next turn, but your eidolon can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to extend the effects until the end of your next turn (like Sustaining a Spell), to a maximum duration of 1 minute.

If the target is evil, it takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its save. Regardless of whether it succeeds, the target becomes temporarily immune for 1 day.

Krytyczny Sukces The target is unaffected.

Sukces The target can't use reactions.

Porażka The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

Krytyczna Porażka As failure, and the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round. The confusion can't be extended, but the other effects can.

Vital Shot.name: Vital Shot
Vital Shot.description: Your careful shot against an unsuspecting opponent pierces a vital artery or organ. Make a ranged Strike. If the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, the Strike deals an extra die of weapon damage, and the foe takes persistent bleed damage equal to the amount of precision damage from your One Shot, One Kill.

Warding Sign.name: Warding Sign
Warding Sign.description:
Częstotliwość once per minute

Aktywator You attempt a saving throw against a magical effect, but you haven't rolled yet

Efekt You call on the power of a personal, eldritch sign of protection, which flares brightly before slowly fading. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw, or a +3 circumstance bonus if the effect is a curse.

Water Transfer.name: Water Transfer
Water Transfer.description:
Częstotliwość once per minute

Wymagania You're on land and adjacent to a body of water

Efekt You sink into the water and emerge back onto land in another space within 120 feet that's adjacent to the same body of water. You can transport yourself, any items you're wearing and holding, and up to one other willing creature.

Whirlwind Maul.name: Whirlwind Maul
Whirlwind Maul.description: Your eidolon lashes out in all directions. It makes a melee unarmed Strike against up to four enemies within reach. It can choose different unarmed attacks for each enemy. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but you don't increase your penalty until the eidolon has made all its attacks.

Wicked Thorns.name: Wicked Thorns
Wicked Thorns.description:
Aktywator You're hit with an unarmed Strike or a Strike with a non-reach melee weapon.

Częstotliwość raz na dzień

Several of your thorns break off and hook into your attacker's body. You deal 1d8 piercing damage to the triggering creature. It attempts a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, the creature also takes 1d4 bleed damage as your thorns embed in its flesh.

At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, this damage increases by 1d8, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

[[/r (ceil(@actor.level/2)d8)[piercing]]]{Leveled piercing damage}

[[/r (1d4+ceil(@actor.level/2)-1)[bleed]]]{Leveled bleed damage}

Wind Them Up.name: Wind Them Up
Wind Them Up.description: Should foes parry your blade or dodge your bullets? Neither—they should be watching their purse. Make a melee Strike with your combination weapon, and then attempt a Thievery check with a –5 penalty to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} from your target; you can't Steal closely guarded objects or objects that would take a long time to pilfer. You don't need a free hand to attempt to Steal something in this manner. If your Thievery check succeeds, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against your ranged attacks until the start of your next turn, and you don't trigger reactions that are normally triggered by movement or a ranged attack. These effects occur even if your target has no objects to Steal.

Wish for Luck.name: Wish for Luck
Wish for Luck.description:
Częstotliwość raz na dzień

Aktywator You are about to roll an attack roll, saving throw, or skill check

Efekt You wish aloud for success. Roll the check twice and take the higher result.

Wyrm's Breath.name: Wyrm's Breath
Wyrm's Breath.description:
Częstotliwość once per minute

Your eidolon gathers the power of the mightiest wyrms to make its magical breath even more spectacular. If your eidolon's next action is to use Breath Weapon, both the number of damage dice and area of the Breath Weapon are doubled.

Breath Weapon (Void) (Cone).name: Zionięcie (Pustka) (Stożek)
Breath Weapon (Void) (Cone).description:
Twój eidolon wydycha podmuch destruktywnej energii. Twój eidolon zadaje wszystkim istotom w @Template[type:cone|distance:30] obrażenia @Damage[1d6[void]], z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu przeciw twojemu ST Zaklęć.

Twój eidolon nie może używać ponownie Zionięcia przez [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rund}.

Na 3. poziomie i co każde 2 kolejne poziomy, obrażenia zionięcia zwiększają się o 1k6. [[/r ((ceil(@actor.level/2))d6)[void]]]{Skalowane Obrażenia}

Breath Weapon (Void) (Line).name: Zionięcie (Pustka) (Linia)
Breath Weapon (Void) (Line).description:
Twój eidolon wydycha podmuch destruktywnej energii. Twój eidolon zadaje wszystkim istotom w @Template[type:line|distance:60] obrażenia @Damage[1d6[void]], z podstawowym rzutem obronnym Refleksu przeciw twojemu ST Zaklęć.

Twój eidolon nie może używać ponownie Zionięcia przez [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1k4 rund}.

Na 3. poziomie i co każde 2 kolejne poziomy, obrażenia zionięcia zwiększają się o 1k6. [[/r ((ceil(@actor.level/2))d6)[void]]]{Skalowane Obrażenia}

Disable a Device.name: Rozbrojenie Urządzenia
Disable a Device.description:
Ta akcja pozwala ci rozbroić pułapkę lub inne złożone urządzenie. Zależnie od swojej konstrukcji i zaawansowania urządzenia mogą nierzadko wymagać więcej niż jednego sukcesu zanim zostaną rozbrojone. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zvLyCVD8g2PdHJAc]{Zestaw Złodziejski} jest pomocny a czasem nawet wymagany do Rozbrajania Urządzenia, co określa MG, a rozbrajanie niektórych urządzeń wymaga również odpowiednio wysokiej biegłości w Złodziejstwie.

Wynik twojego testu Złodziejstwa decyduje o tym jak duże postępy w rozbrajaniu poczynasz.

Krytyczny Sukces Rozbrajasz urządzenie lub osiągasz dwa sukcesy na rzecz rozbrajania złożonego urządzenia. Nie pozostawiasz żadnych śladów swojej interwencji oraz możesz na nowo uzbroić urządzenie jeśli jego konstrukcja na to pozwala.

Sukces Rozbrajasz urządzenie lub osiągasz jeden sukces na rzecz rozbrajania złożonego urządzenia.

Krytyczna Porażka Uruchamiasz urządzenie.

Drain Familiar.name: Drain Familiar
Drain Familiar.description:
Częstotliwość once per day

Wymagania Your familiar is on your person.

You expend the magical power stored in your familiar. During the current turn, you can cast one spell you prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot. You must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.

Inspired Stratagem.name: Inspired Stratagem
Inspired Stratagem.description:
Aktywator An ally you reviewed stratagems with is about to attempt an attack roll or skill check

Efekt The ally rolls the triggering check twice and takes the better of the two results. That ally then becomes temporarily immune to your Inspired Stratagem until your next daily preparations.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.K0Sv9AHgq245hSLC]{Effect: Inspired Stratagem}

Patron's Claim.name: Patron's Claim
Patron's Claim.description:
Częstotliwość once per hour

Efekt Your familiar's mouth opens impossibly wide before your patron's grasping limb stretches forth from it at a creature within 30 feet, dealing @Damage[10d10[spirit]] damage with a basic Fortitude save against your spell DC. If the creature fails its save and takes damage, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 4} on a critical failure) and you regain 1 Focus Point, up to your usual maximum, as your patron grants you additional magic in exchange for your gift of your opponent's spirit.

Patron's Presence.name: Patron's Presence
Patron's Presence.description:
Częstotliwość once per hour

Efekt A palpable weight extends from your familiar in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]. Enemies who enter or start their turn within the aura must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} as long as they remain within the aura, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} on a critical failure. The aura lasts until the end of your next turn, but the familiar can Sustain it up to 1 minute.

Primal Howl.name: Primal Howl
Primal Howl.description:
Częstotliwość once per hour

Efekt Your familiar screeches and howls, empowered with natural magic. All creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] take @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))d6[sonic]] damage for every 2 levels your companion has, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true] save against your spell DC. Creatures that fail become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, and creatures that critically fail become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}. The fright is an emotion, fear, and mental effect.

Reactive Strike.name: Reaktywny Cios
Reactive Strike.description:
Aktywator Istota w twoim wysięgu wykonuję akcję z cechą manipulacji lub ruchu, wykonuje atak dystansowy lub opuszcza pole w wyniku używania akcji ruchu.

Nacierasz na wroga wykorzystując lukę powstałą w jego defensywie. Wykonaj Cios w zwarciu w aktywującą istotę. Jeśli twój atak jest trafieniem krytycznym i aktywowała go akcja z cechą manipulacji, przerywasz tę akcję. Ten Cios nie wlicza się do twojej kary za atak wielokrotny, a twoja kara za atak wielokrotny nie aplikuje się do niego.

Reposition.name: Przemieszczenie
Reposition.description:
Wymagania You either have at least one hand free, or you're grabbing or restraining the target. The target can't be more than one size larger than you.

You muscle a creature or object around. Attempt an Athletics check against the target's Fortitude DC.

Krytyczny Sukces You move the creature up to 10 feet. It must remain within your reach during this movement, and you can't move it into or through obstacles.

Sukces You move the target up to 5 feet. It must remain within your reach during this movement, and you can't move it into or through obstacles.

Krytyczna Porażka The target can move you up to 5 feet as though it successfully Repositioned you.

Shed Spirit.name: Shed Spirit
Shed Spirit.description:
Częstotliwość once per 10 minutes

Efekt Your familiar's spirit exits its body, leaving its empty shell behind, before flying at an enemy within 20 feet and dealing @Damage[(6+max(0,(ceil((@actor.level -8)/2)*2)))d6[spirit]] damage, with a @Check[type:will|basic:true] save against your spell DC. If the familiar dealt damage, it then flies to an ally within 30 feet of the enemy, restoring Hit Points equal to half the damage dealt. Your familiar then re-forms in its original square. At 9th level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the attack deals an additional 2d6 damage.

Stitching Strike.name: Stitching Strike
Stitching Strike.description:
Częstotliwość once per 10 minutes

Efekt Your familiar unravels into magical fibers that encompass an enemy within 30 feet and deal @Damage[(6+max(0,(ceil((@actor.level -8)/2)*2)))d6[slashing]] damage, with a @Check[type:reflex|basic:true] save against your spell DC. On a failure, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round or until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} against your spell DC. Your familiar then re-forms in its original square. At 9th level, and every 2 levels thereafter, the attack deals an additional 2d6 damage.

Sustain.name: Sustain
Sustain.description:
Choose one of your effects that has a sustained duration or lists a special benefit when you Sustain it. Most such effects come from spells or magic item activations. If the effect has a sustained duration, its duration extends until the end of your next turn. (Sustaining more than once in the same turn doesn't extend the duration to subsequent turns.) If an ability can be sustained but doesn't list how long, it can be sustained up to 10 minutes.

An effect might list an additional benefit that occurs if you Sustain it, and this can even appear on effects that don't have a sustained duration. If the effect has both a special benefit and a sustained duration, your Sustain action extends the duration as well as having the special benefit.

If your Sustain action is disrupted, the ability ends.

True Shapeshift.name: True Shapeshift
True Shapeshift.description:
Wymagania You're under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{Untamed Form}

Efekt You change into any other shape on your untamed form list. If the duration of that shape is different from the one you were previously in, use the shorter duration to determine your duration remaining.

Verdant Rest.name: Verdant Rest
Verdant Rest.description: You turn into a tree or other non-creature plant. This has the effect of using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{One with Plants} to turn into a plant, except that your AC is 30. You can Dismiss this effect to turn back. If you rest for 10 minutes in this form in natural sunlight, you recover half your maximum Hit Points. If you take your daily rest in this form, the rest restores you to maximum Hit Points and removes all non-permanent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} conditions, as well as all poisons and diseases of 19th level or lower.
